title: Keity Changed Our Lives + Moe Overheard Awkward Bathroom Conversation
description:
If you haven't heard, Moe has a podcast – “In The Moement” - and every week he covers a variety of topics.
In episode 124, there was a debate about covering your toothbrush at home. This debate led to another conversation Moe wasn't prepared for. Do you close your toilet lid or not?
Keity brought this topic to The Bert Show last week and since then Bert, Moe, and Kristin all agree that Keity has changed their lives.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
